function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Neglecting the environmental dimension and focusing solely on human health","Impact":"Increased risk of neglecting important ecosystem services and interactions that impact human health","Mitigation":"Integrating environmental and human health considerations in urban planning and policy-making","Technologies":"Ecosystem modeling and simulation tools for urban planning","People":"Public health officials, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Changing the focus of environment and animals as sources of diseases towards salutogenic approaches","Impact":"Risk of overlooking potential disease vectors or sources due to a solely positive focus on environment and animals","Mitigation":"Balancing salutogenic approaches with disease surveillance and management","Technologies":"Remote sensing for disease monitoring, wildlife health tracking technologies","People":"Public health officials, wildlife conservationists","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Non-domestic animals in urban areas impacting human and animal health","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic diseases and conflicts between urban wildlife and human activities","Mitigation":"Implementing wildlife management strategies, disease surveillance and control measures","Technologies":"Urban wildlife tracking technologies, GIS mapping for wildlife-human interaction zones","People":"Urban residents, public health officials, urban wildlife conservationists","Owner":"Local government, wildlife management agencies"}]}
